name: please save us!
description:
In this game you have to save two people that are stucked on their planets. You can shoot the asteroids and land on planets to save people.

Made for Rainbow Jam 2019.

Controls:

  • Left: Goes to left
  • Right: Goes to right
  • Up: Accelerates spaceship
  • Down: Deaccelerates spaceship
  • Shift: Reverses direction
  • Space: Shoots bullet
